name: Ascension (itch) (Roberto Romao)
description:
Open your eyes...

You find yourself lying down on a beautiful and great grass plain....

You have no memory of who you are and where did you come from....

After standing up you see a medallion on your neck, and after getting a better look you can read a word on it, maybe it is your name..?

Game made by Roberto Romão for LD40 D:!

Theme, The more you have, worse it is

Link for Vote ! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/ascension

MusicHeavy Heart by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
